thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 31 of 1820
thread.title: Elaine mary

author: Elaine mary
title: Elaine mary
text: We needed to make the most of our English pounds. With TransferWise, we received an email to say when was the best time to exchange pounds to euros to get the best price. It was quick, easy, and when we had a slight problem the people in the office were efficient and helpful. They were recommended very highly to us, and we pass the recommendation on to anyone reading this message.
